EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ StormRoom™ with Kevlar®
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ StormRoom™ with Kevlar®
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in DuPont™ StormRoom™ with Kevlar®.
A Safe Storm Room in Your House
Imagine a safe, secure place right in the home, removed from harms way during a tornado or hurricane. A place that can blend seamlessly with a family’s everyday life and offer storm protection when it counts. That place is the DuPont™ StormRoom™, the only in-home shelter reinforced with DuPont™ KEVLAR®.
To learn more about DuPont™ StormRoom™ with Kevlar®, please copy and paste the following web address into your web browser.
http://www2.dupont.com/Stormroom/en_US/
http://www2.dupont.com/Stormroom/en_US/where_to_buy/buy.html
DuPont Protection Solutions
